passage_text: Average Biomedical Technician salaries for job postings nationwide are 37% lower than average salaries for all job postings nationwide.

Biomedical technician salary in USA. An average starting hourly wage for a biomedical technician in the United States ranges from between $14.85 – $28.33 per hour which gradually increases by $20.88 – $44.28 overtime. An average annual salary bonus of around $2,469 will be included and the total annual salary ranges from between $31,600 – $61,941. Conclusion about biomedical technician salary. Salaries by State. Biomedical equipment technicians working in Utah reported the highest average salary by state in 2011, $59,830 a year. Arizona ranked second with an average annual salary of $57,800 for BMETs, followed by Alaska at $55,390, Minnesota at $55,140 and Maryland at $54,560.
